imdb.plot outline: Past Dark is a psychological horror set in the present day. The movie follows Arthur Brooks; a troubled young man searching for the truth and with the help of his friends Joel and Dolton, they set out to help their friend discover the truth about his mother's disappearance. Arthur and his friends venture to the abandoned laboratories, the last known location of his mother. The group unknowingly enter an alternative reality in which they encounter unthinkable creatures whose sole purpose is to seek, possess and push their victims to the peak of insanity.
